SEARCH

Uses of Package
backgammon

  • Classes in backgammon used by backgammon
    Class
    Description
    BackgammonBoard
    A BackgammonBoard object represents a backgammon board
    BackgammonGame
    The BackgammonGame Class is used to represent a game of Backgammon
    BackgammonMatch
    The BackgammonMatch Class is used to represent a match of Backgammon
    Bar
    A Bar is an extension of the BoardSpace class, representing a bar on the backgammon board
    BearedOffSpace
    A BearedOffSpace is an extension of the BoardSpace class, representing a beared off space on the backgammon board
    BoardSpace
    A BoardSpace represents any space where a checker can reside on the Backgammon Board.
    Checker
    A Checker object represents a single checker in the game of backgammon
    Colour
    the Colour enum represents the two colours in backgammon
    Move
    A Move class represents a move from one space to another in backgammon.
    Player
    A Player represents a player in a match of Backgammon
    Point
    A Point is a subclass of the BoardSpace class, representing a single point on the backgammon board
